The Large Winter Parka: Regular fit, rear and thigh coverage
Detachable Hood | Two-Way Zip | Numerous: Long two-way front zipper with protective flap

Specifications.Materials:
[outer] 100% Polyamide 
[lining 1] 100% Polyester, 100% Polyester fleece 
[lining 2] 100% Polyester 
[membrane] 100% Polyurethane Hydratic
Specifications.Pockets:
[exterior] 2 large zippered breast pockets, 1 media player on the sleeve, 2 bellowed pockets with backing hand-warming pockets at the hem 
[interior] 2 mesh pockets, 2 media player pockets with ear phones openings, safety pockets, 1 Napoleon zip pocket
Specifications.Recommended Use: Winter Snowstorms, Around Town Activities, Mountains Adventures, Winter in the Forest
